sn4.12:3.1: 12. Kinnusīhasutta
sn4.12:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn4.12:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ deseti.
sn4.12:5.2: “ayaṃ kho samaṇo gotamo mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ deseti.
sn4.12:5.3: Yannūnāhaṃ yena samaṇo gotamo tenupasaṅkameyyaṃ vicakkhukammāyā”ti.
sn4.12:5.4: Atha kho māro pāpimā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4.12:8.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā “jānāti maṃ bhagavā, jānāti maṃ sugato”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
